markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skeletal Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=3540) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=236" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 57</row>

</column>

---

Your body becomes resistant, your hardened bones deflecting weapons and other forms of damage. You gain resistance 2 to [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), piercing, and slashing damage. This resistance increases to 3 at 13th level and 4 at 17th level.
name: Skeletal Resistance
